overview:
Kamlesh Pant is a Sr. VP at Piron Corporation • Piron Corporation is a New York & Noida based E-learning company specializing in: Custom Content Development | Learning Management System | Online Courses | Mobile Learning • Piron’s client list includes Fortune 500 companies

Kamlesh’s Specializations: Strategy, General Management, Product Management, Marketing

degrees.subject: Double Major: Strategy and Marketing
degrees.institution: Indian School of Business (ISB) Hyderabad, INDIA
